Pa PERIOD Military Museum offers eighteenth century reenactment

Captain Robert Cluggages Company is marching straight out of the Revolutionary War and into Boalsburg where they will bed down for the night at the Pennsylvania Military Museum PERIOD

The museums fourth annual  Days of Revolutionary Fun will feature an eighteenth century reenactment group camping out this weekend in front of the museum and demonstrating camp life to curious visitors PERIOD

This is to provide visitors with the sights sounds and smells of the 1700s said William Leech museum director PERIOD

Days of Revolution

This is a fairly new attempt to create a Revolutionary War period Leech said PERIOD It is to broaden other periods and take advantage of volunteers that are interested in that period. the Cluggages Ranging Company a local reenactment group will bring the Revolutionary War alive with educational demonstrations of eighteenth century clothing interpretive dancing and a tactical military exhibition PERIOD

The reenactment group will hold a fashion show of what they wore in the field and give a tactical demonstration on flint lock rifles Joe Horvath museum educator and acting curator said PERIOD Horvath who has been in charge of the festival all four years said The company will act as scouts and guides like during the Revolutionary War. the encampment will portray frontier life during the American Revolution and is open to the public from  a.m PERIOD to  p.m PERIOD

They will demonstrate camp life activities what the equipment tents and bedding look like Leech said PERIOD

Horvath said the reenactors try to involve the audience PERIOD

There will be interpretive dancing with the audience including line dancing Horvath said PERIOD

Last year we had about  people come each day and about  people during the dancing Horvath said PERIOD There are more families that come than single people. we will also have guided tours through the museum every day at  oclock Horvath added PERIOD

Some of the museum highlights are a fullscale replica of a World War I trench battlefield displayed military uniforms and weapons along with their narrative histories as well as renovated military equipment PERIOD Also on the grounds are examples of military armored vehicles PERIOD

We are hoping that word of mouth will bring in new visitors Leech said PERIOD

The Friends of the Pennsylvania Military Museum are commemorating the War for Independence by sponsoring the event PERIOD The museum is located on Rt PERIOD  in Boalsburg PERIOD
